Summary: fireball coming down very fast from space, stopped about 1 mile above lake MIchigan, hovered and moved from left to right, then shot bake out very fast!
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Holland
There were no other sightings in Holland on or around June 27th 0001
divs: Sighting Detailsthis past weekend friday night 11:30 pm, i was having a beachfire watching the sky as normal due to preveuos ufo sighting by myself over the past 7 years. so i am watching the sky, when i saw what i believed to be a meteor come down , straight down very fast, and extremely bright. it was very bright white like a meteor. i kept watching expecting it to act as metoers do as they fall. this very bright light kept falling, when all of a sudden it came to a complete stop, and hovered about a mile or so above lake Michigan. i continued to watch, then it began to go from left to right, as it manuvered around in a small area, it allmost went in a pattern like a square ...suttlely left, right, and up and down. finally after making these turns, acents and decents, it came to a complete stop "hover again" and at a very extreme speed it went out the exact path it came in, it went back up, this object shot out towrds space. going from a very large "fireball" to a ball less than half it original size, finally down to a pin point size, kept going straight up untill it dissapeard into space. from my observation the change in size was due to the extreme distance and speed that it went back into space at. i know you guys probably get alot of people making false claims, trying to get on the news, or trying to just get attention. i am 24 years old, i am not seeking fame or recognition at the slightest level. i have lived on lake michigan all 24 years of my life, and in the past seven years i have seen 5 sights of unexplainable crafts. i have never been a skywatcher untill my first sighting over lake michigan august 8th, 2001. and i know my august 8th sighting was not something with humans in it, the manuvers the craft was doing would kill a person. this summer i have had two sights in the past month. where i live is directly under the path planes take to the Grand Rapids air port, ten miles noth is the grand haven air port, and ten miles south is holland air port. i see planes of all shapes and sizes, and i know what air planes look like, especialy their lights at night. air force jets, and coast guard hellicopters fly over daily. these craft were no heeli's or planes. i would love to tell you guys about all of my sighting, i am not a spoof, a mentally disturbed person. i an an honest young man who has seen the things in the sky, that have the same charecteristics as hundreds if not thousands of ufo reports all over the world. i keep what ive seen a secret from a lot of people, and the people i do tell laugh at me, and treat me like im crazy.well im not crazy, i allmost wish i would have never seen any of them, especially my first sighting. it was scary, yet very intreging. but at the same time it broke my moral and religous fabric of my life. i hate to assume that what i saw was alien, but nothing else explains it? i feel i will never know what ive seen, and thats where people like you come in. we need answeres, we need the truth, and i know that some american out there has it. thanks to all of you, we need many more groups like mufon. god bless+
